testcase.name: Verify if login is successful with valid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened swag labs browser.....................................passed And User has navigated to the login page....................................passed When User enters valid standard_user and secret_sauce.......................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should be able to see Product page................................passed

testcase.name: Verify if login is successful with valid credentials - Example #1.2

testcase.name: Verify if login is un-successful with invalid credentials - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User has opened swag labs browser.....................................passed And User has navigated to the login page....................................passed When User enters invalid coba and coba123...................................passed And User clicks on login button.............................................passed Then User should be able to see the error pop up message....................passed
